it isnt racist, since it is a culturally engrained thing, kind of like how white people live in a culture fueled by rock, hence why most people who perform rock are white.

in fact there is only like 6 white rappers in the industry today (eminem, mac miller, yelawolf, riff-raff, lil ugly mane and EL-P)(and 2 of those are meme rappers) compare that to the thousands of black rappers there is, and that number seems incredibly small

topics.body:
God damn it; the shit going on in Missouri is getting fucking stupid.  All the evidence is pointing towards it being murder and now the local police and people the officer now are going essentially "Nuh-uh; my friend's uncle's brother's cousin's former roommate said-".  You can go on a radio station all you want and claim that the rumor you heard is factually true, but if the physical evidence contradicts the "witnesses" then chances are the witness is lying.

The officer shot the person six times and multiple times after the victim was already dead; shooting someone after they're dead is pretty evident it wasn't a "accident" or in "self defense" or some bullcrap.




Also the rebels in Ukraine are being dicks; they're starting to open fire on refugees.  For a group claiming that people of Russian descent are being "persecuted" they sure have no objection to killing civilians.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
